H0.text: who is the first wife on sister wives. Janelle

H1.text: who is the first wife on sister wives. Christine

H2.text: who is the first wife on sister wives. Robyn

H3.text: who is the first wife on sister wives. Meri

A4.text: Kody and Meri were a married couple for three years before Janelle married Kody and soon after, Christine married Kody.

A5.text: Robyn was the first new wife to enter the family in 16 years and brought three children from her first marriage.
